snippet: Seventeen years after Baithe Diop’s slaying, a federal investigator linked the killing to a confession by two gang members.
abstract: Federal authorities conclude that all five people now imprisoned for the 1995 murder of livery driver Baithe Diop are innocent of the crime; investigator has linked the murder to a confession by two gang members; new findings suggest that there was a colossal breakdown in the criminal justice system.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Seventeen years after Baithe Diop’s slaying, a federal investigator linked the killing to a confession by two gang members.

headline.seo: 5 Convicted in Bronx Cabby’s 1995 Murder Are Innocent, U.S. Says
headline.main: 5 Jailed in ’95 Killing of Cabby Didn’t Do It, U.S. Inquiry Says
headline.print_headline: 5 Jailed in ’95 Killing of Cabby Didn’t Do It, U.S. Inquiry Says
